backend/main.mo: Defines core backend actor with types, access control, user profiles, report storage, international contact lookup, and terms document handling.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence entries mapping feature IDs to affected files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries for multiple frontend source files used for build planning.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind base styles defining OKLCH color variables and light/dark theme tokens.
frontend/index.html: Main HTML entry point loading the React app and PWA manifest/icons.
frontend/LIVE_INTEGRATION_RESTART_RUNBOO: Runbook describing steps to restart live integration cleanly after failure.
frontend/PHASE3A_READONLY_FRONTEND_NOCHA: Documentation confirming no frontend changes are required for Phase 3a read‑only canister integration.
frontend/PRODUCTION_BUILD_VERIFICATION.m: Checklist for validating a clean production build including routing, consent modal, branding, and antifraud analysis behavior.
frontend/public/404.html: SPA fallback page that auto-redirects known routes back to the app shell.
frontend/public/data/public-contact-look: Static dataset mapping known phone and email contacts to public directory metadata.
frontend/public/manifest.webmanifest: PWA manifest defining app metadata, icons, colors, and launch behavior.
frontend/public/service-worker.js: Service worker handling precaching, network‑first fetch strategy, and offline fallback.
frontend/PWA_WEBAPK_ANDROID_TEST.md: Android Chrome WebAPK test procedure verifying real WebAPK installation vs shortcut.
frontend/scripts/live-integration-comple: Wrapper script that runs the restart integration script and outputs a single success line if valid.
frontend/scripts/restart-live-integratio: Build workflow script that cleans artifacts, verifies files, installs deps, builds, and outputs a fixed success message.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React app handling routing, consent gate, PWA setup, and page rendering.
frontend/src/backend.idl.ts: IDL definition exposing a single analyzeText function.
frontend/src/components/AdvancedContactL: Component performing contact-type detection, public lookup, antifraud analysis, caching, and offline behavior.
UI card displaying analysis risk, explanation, public info, and reporting options.
frontend/src/components/AppLayout.tsx: Main layout component providing header, navigation, mobile menu, and footer while handling route-based menu behavior.
frontend/src/components/AuthControl.tsx: Authentication UI that shows login button or user profile menu based on Internet Identity state.
frontend/src/components/CollaborativeRes: Displays collaborative lookup results including risk score, report count, categories, and messages for loading or errors.
frontend/src/components/ConsentGateModal: Modal that requires users to accept cookies and terms before proceeding, with links to terms and privacy pages.
frontend/src/components/CookieStorageSet: Modal for viewing stored local data and clearing cached history and user data.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer displaying branding, current year, and external links with official seals.
frontend/src/components/InstallButton.ts: Button that triggers PWA installation and alerts users if installation is not available.
frontend/src/components/InternationalCon: Displays international contact risk details with score, country info, trust score, and source links using badges and icons.
frontend/src/components/LanguageSelector: Provides a dropdown for switching UI languages with a button showing the current language.
frontend/src/components/PublicEntitySeal: Renders grouped seals from public institutions (Portugal, USA, EU) with icons and external links.
frontend/src/components/PwaInstallAction: Button that triggers PWA installation using a provided install handler.
frontend/src/components/ReportSubmission: Dialog for submitting anonymous or authenticated reports with category selection, description, and success/error handling.
frontend/src/components/StructuredAnalys: Card component showing structured fraud analysis results including risk level, explanation, recommendation, and sources.
frontend/src/components/TermsContent.tsx: Renders terms of service sections with headings, paragraphs, and optional public entity seals.
frontend/src/components/TermsModal.tsx: Modal that displays the terms content inside a scrollable dialog window.
Renders a user profile menu showing identity info, cookie settings, and searchable history with clear actions.
frontend/src/config/features.ts: Defines feature-flag interface, default values, and helpers for checking PRO and external provider enablement.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's identity, refreshing dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdvancedContactLoo: Provides localStorage-backed caching for phone and email lookup results with add, retrieve, and clear utilities.
frontend/src/hooks/useAntiFraudActors.ts: Initializes main, extra, and report canister actors using Internet Identity and logs readiness once per load.
frontend/src/hooks/useConsentGate.ts: Tracks whether the user has accepted current terms, storing acceptance in localStorage and exposing consent state.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternationalConta: Performs international contact lookups via backend actor and returns results or fallback data with loading/error state.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Manages Internet Identity authentication, loading stored identities and exposing login, logout, and status flags.
frontend/src/hooks/useIsAdmin.ts: Checks if the current authenticated user is an admin using the backend actor with cached query behavior.
frontend/src/hooks/useOfflineStatus.ts: Tracks browser online/offline status via event listeners.
frontend/src/hooks/useSubmitLookupReport: Submits spam/phishing/scam reports to backend with loading, success, and error state handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useTermsDocument.ts: Fetches the current terms document from the backend actor with loading and error indicators.
frontend/src/hooks/useUserProfile.ts: React hook managing user profile history tied to Internet Identity, with load, add, and clear functions stored in local storage.
frontend/src/i18n/I18nProvider.tsx: Provides i18n context with persisted language selection and fallback translation merging from Portuguese.
frontend/src/i18n/translations.ts: Defines supported languages and translation keys, providing the full Portuguese base dictionary.
frontend/src/ic/actors.ts: Creates DFINITY canister actors for main, extra, and reports canisters using a shared HttpAgent.
frontend/src/ic/canisterIds.ts: Exports static canister IDs and a helper to resolve them by type.
frontend/src/ic/idl/extra.idl.ts: Candid IDL and TS interface for the Extra canister exposing phone and crypto report lookups.
frontend/src/ic/idl/main.idl.ts: Candid IDL and TS interface for the Main canister providing text analysis.
frontend/src/ic/idl/reports.idl.ts: Candid IDL and TS interfaces for submitting fraud reports and querying email, phone, message, and crypto lookups.
frontend/src/ic/readinessReport.ts: Generates and logs a readiness report validating actors and method availability for all canisters.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind-based global styles defining color variables, dark mode, accessibility rules, and mobile touch targets.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point initializing React, Internet Identity provider, React Query client, and global styles.
frontend/src/pages/AdminTermsPage.tsx: Admin page for viewing and updating the terms document with form inputs, validation, and canister update calls.
frontend/src/pages/DocumentationPage.tsx: Renders a documentation page with SEO setup, content overview, and a button to generate a PDF. Manages loading state while generating the document.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Implements the homepage with fraud‑analysis tools for messages, email, phone, and crypto, handling user input, validation, and displaying structured results.
frontend/src/pages/HowItWorksPage.tsx: Displays explanations of verification methods and processes using accordion sections and sets SEO metadata. Provides structured descriptions for email, phone, message, and crypto checks.
frontend/src/pages/InternationalContactS: Implements an international contact lookup with input validation, normalization, backend lookup calls, and SEO setup. Shows results, errors, and loading states.
frontend/src/pages/MissionPage.tsx: Renders mission‑related sections such as vision, core mission, social impact, and values, pulling text from translations and setting SEO metadata.
frontend/src/pages/PrivacyPage.tsx: Displays privacy policy sections dynamically from translation data and sets SEO metadata. Includes header and multiple content cards.
frontend/src/pages/TermsPage.tsx: Sets SEO metadata and renders the terms content component with optional seals.
frontend/src/pwa/install.ts: Manages PWA install prompt events by storing the deferred prompt and triggering installation when requested.
frontend/src/router/useSimpleRouter.ts: Implements a minimal client-side router using shared state, custom navigation events, and the History API.
frontend/src/utils/antifraudTextNormaliz: Provides text normalization and keyword/phrase matching utilities with accent-insensitive and partial matching support.
frontend/src/utils/contactInputHeuristic: Detects, normalizes, and validates phone and email inputs with simple heuristics and multilingual error messages.
Builds structured institutional documentation content using translation data and predefined sections.
frontend/src/utils/emailHeuristics.ts: Analyzes email addresses for fraud risk using deterministic checks for domains, TLDs, patterns, and suspicious formats.
frontend/src/utils/generateDocumentation: Generates and downloads a text-based documentation file by assembling structured documentation content.
frontend/src/utils/highRiskPhrases.ts: Defines high- and medium-risk phrase patterns with categories and weights for fraud detection heuristics.
frontend/src/utils/localRateLimit.ts: Implements a simple localStorage-based rate limiter with a 1-minute cooldown for submissions.
frontend/src/utils/messageHeuristics.ts: Implements keyword, URL, crypto, and formatting–based scam scoring to classify message risk.
frontend/src/utils/phoneCountry.ts: Extracts country names from phone numbers by matching leading international codes.
frontend/src/utils/publicContactLookup.t: Loads a same-origin JSON dataset and looks up public contact metadata by normalized phone or email keys.
frontend/src/utils/publicSourceProviders: Aggregates public‑source presence info using local lookup and optional future external providers.
frontend/src/utils/riskScoring.ts: Computes 0‑100 risk scores from factor weights and maps scores to Low/Medium/High levels.
frontend/src/utils/riskWeights.ts: Defines default risk scoring weights and thresholds and exports a shared configuration object.
frontend/src/utils/seo.ts: Sets document title and meta description for runtime SEO branding.
frontend/src/utils/structuredFraudAnalys: Runs structured fraud analysis using keyword rules, scoring, and localized explanation templates.
frontend/src/utils/translateBackendResul: Performs dictionary-based translation of Portuguese backend analysis text into other languages.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers for extracting, persisting, and clearing URL parameters and session-stored values.
frontend/src/utils/userProfileStorage.ts: Provides localStorage-based CRUD utilities for user profiles, history items, and consent/cache clearing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: TailwindCSS configuration defining theme extensions, colors, breakpoints, animations, and plugin integrations.
project_state.json: Holds project metadata, architectural constraints, feature definitions, and pending requests for antifraud logic updates.
